stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Clearwater, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Clearwater are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Clearwater's large population of retirees and families benefits from strong consumer protection laws designed to prevent predatory lending.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Clearwater must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Pinellas County Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Clearwater location? We also serve these nearby beach communities:

faq.question: Where is your Clearwater cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Clearwater branch is located at 2156 Cleveland Street, Suite 190, right near beautiful Clearwater Beach and the famous Pier 60. We're easy to access from US-19.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Clearwater location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins always welcome!

faq.question: Is parking available at the Clearwater location?
faq.answer: Yes! We have convenient parking available. It's easy to park and get in and out quickly.

faq.question: Can I get a cash advance for a vacation emergency?
faq.answer: Yes! We serve visitors and tourists as well as residents. If you need emergency cash for an unexpected expense during your Clearwater vacation, we can help.

faq.question: What makes Clearwater's payday loan laws special?
faq.answer: Florida law prohibits rollovers and has a 24-hour cooling-off period between loans. You also get a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling if you can't repay on time. These protections are among the strongest in the nation.
